trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"></xref> that is a composite of the transforms in its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransform"> </xref> ，它是在转换中的复合其<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the GeneralTransformGroup class when you want to apply multiple general transforms to single object.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要将多个常规转换应用于单个对象，请使用 GeneralTransformGroup 类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref> objects that form this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>构成此对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref> objects that form this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>构成此对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup.Children*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup.Children*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup.Children*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the inverse transform of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>, if it has an inverse.
trans-unit.target: 获取此逆变<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"> </xref>，如果它存在逆矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The inverse of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup> is created by combining the inverses of its child transforms.
trans-unit.target: 函数的反函数<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup>通过结合其子变换的逆方法创建。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup>

trans-unit.source: The inverse transform of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"></xref>, if it has an inverse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此逆变<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeneralTransformGroup"> </xref>，如果它具有逆实例; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified bounding box to the smallest axis-aligned bounding box possible that contains all the points in the original bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 转换到的最小轴对齐边界框可能包含原始边界框中的所有点的指定边界框。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的边界框。

trans-unit.source: The transformed bounding box, which is the smallest axis-aligned bounding box possible that contains all the points in the original bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 转换后边界框，这是最小轴对齐边界框可能包含原始边界框中的所有点。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transform the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 尝试转换指定的点。

trans-unit.source: The point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要变换的点。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming `inPoint`.
trans-unit.target: 转换的结果`inPoint`。

trans-unit.source: **true** if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果 inPoint 转换; 否则为**false**。
